title: L.acidophilus HSCC LA042 and HKL suspension ameliorate DSS-induced ulcerative colitis in mice by improving the intestinal barrier inhibiting the NLRP3 inflammasome and pathogenic bacteria
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Jiwei Zhu, Hanming Wang, Muaitaer Aisikaer, Zainaipuguli Yisimayili, Tongtong Yang, Wenjun Zhou, Jianfeng Zhao, Kurexi Yunusi, Kasimujiang Aximujiang
